function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread and global reach of COVID-19","Impact":"Severe global pandemic affecting multiple continents","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict public health measures, travel restrictions, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing kits, and vaccine development technologies","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations, and international health bodies"},{"Description":"Disruptions to global and national supply chains","Impact":"Shortages of essential goods, including manufacturing parts, health care materials, and food products","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply chains, stockpiling of essential goods, and investment in local production","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, inventory tracking systems, and predictive analytics","People":"Manufacturers, retailers, and consumers","Owner":"Businesses, government agencies, and logistics companies"},{"Description":"Reduction in air cargo volume and shipping disruptions","Impact":"Delays in delivery of critical goods, including medical supplies and food products","Mitigation":"Development of alternative transportation methods, optimization of shipping routes, and investment in logistics infrastructure","Technologies":"Drone delivery systems, autonomous vehicles, and smart logistics platforms","People":"Logistics companies, shipping companies, and consumers","Owner":"Transportation industry, government agencies, and technology companies"}]}
